extendedInfo.description: No more silly "Is He Cheating on Me" quizzes or wondering late at night if your man is out there doing dirt. Don't spend all of your money on an private investigator either! All you need to catch your cheating boyfriend is his cell phone number and the use of this GPS system to hunt him down and get the answers to the doubts and burning questions in your mind and most of all in your heart.

reviews.comment: Just takes you to a website
reviews.author: A Google User
